mapper.insert: insert into t_operation_log (id, logType, logName, userId, className, method, data, createTime, succeed, ip, messgae) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{logtype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{logname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{classname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{method,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{data,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{succeed,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{messgae,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update t_operation_log set logType = #{logtype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, logName = #{logname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, userId = #{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, className = #{classname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, method = #{method,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, data = #{data,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, succeed = #{succeed,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ip = #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, messgae = #{messgae,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, logType, logName, userId, className, method, data, createTime, succeed, ip, messgae from t_operation_log where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, logType, logName, userId, className, method, data, createTime, succeed, ip, messgae from t_operation_log
